abstract: This week, the two entertain doubts on the future of Theranos, and on the suspiciously public canoodling of Taylor Swift and Tom Hiddleston.
snippet: This week, the two entertain doubts on the future of Theranos, and on the suspiciously public canoodling of Taylor Swift and Tom Hiddleston.
lead_paragraph: Each Saturday, Farhad Manjoo and Mike Isaac, technology reporters at The New York Times, review the week’s news, offering analysis and maybe a joke or two about the most important developments in the tech industry.

headline.main: Farhad’s and Mike’s Week in Tech: Snapchat Old Hat? Oh, and Theranos

byline.original: By Farhad Manjoo and Mike Isaac
